title: IFillPatternFeatureData.SeedFeatureCenter
description: Gets or sets the vertex or sketch point where to place the center of the seed cut feature of this fill pattern feature.
returns: Vertex or sketch point where to place the center of the seed cut feature
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IFillPatternFeatureData::FeaturesToPatternType
=
swFeaturesToPatternType_e
.swFeaturesToPatternCreateSeedCut.
